common_1140_friend_00: Have we finally reached the deepest part?![npcn:6]
common_1140_rival_00:
We made it! Ready to see if those legends of
treasure down here are for real?![npcn:4]
common_1140_botan_00:
Heh. Yeah, right. That’s just fluff they write to fill
the textbooks.[npcn:8]
common_1140_hakase_01a: Hello, children. You’ve done well to make it here.[npcn:B]
common_1140_hakase_01b: Hello, children. You’ve done well to make it here.[npcn:E]
common_1140_hakase_02a: The structure you see before you is the Zero Lab.[npcn:B]
common_1140_hakase_02b: The structure you see before you is the Zero Lab.[npcn:E]
common_1140_rival_01: That’s where you are, right, Professor?[npcn:4]
common_1140_botan_01:
But wait...why does it look like the whole place is
being swallowed up by crystals?[npcn:8]
common_1140_hakase_03a:
The crystals here in Area Zero possess a
peculiar energy.[npcn:B]
common_1140_hakase_03b:
The crystals here in Area Zero possess a
peculiar energy.[npcn:E]
common_1140_hakase_04a:
This energy can alter the functions of living things
and optimize the performance of machinery.[npcn:B]
common_1140_hakase_04b:
This energy can alter the functions of living things
and optimize the performance of machinery.[npcn:E]
common_1140_hakase_05a:
It is the same energy that allows Pokémon to
Terastallize.[npcn:B]
common_1140_hakase_05b:
It is the same energy that allows Pokémon to
Terastallize.[npcn:E]
common_1140_friend_01:
So, this entire building’s been Terastallized?
Is that what you’re saying?[npcn:6]
common_1140_botan_03:
The professor implied something important
about Tera Orbs just now.\c
They’re made from the crystals down here in
Area Zero...aren’t they?[npcn:8]
common_1140_hakase_06a: Indeed. Though not many know it.[npcn:B]
common_1140_hakase_06b: Indeed. Though not many know it.[npcn:E]
common_1140_hakase_07a:
Since you have disabled all four locks, the gate
to the Zero Lab should now open for you.[npcn:B]
common_1140_hakase_07b:
Since you have disabled all four locks, the gate
to the Zero Lab should now open for you.[npcn:E]
common_1140_hakase_08a:
But once you open the gate, you will quickly be
confronted with the dangerous Pokémon inside.\r
They will likely make a break for freedom.[npcn:B]
common_1140_hakase_08b:
But once you open the gate, you will quickly be
confronted with the dangerous Pokémon inside.\r
They will likely make a break for freedom.[npcn:E]
common_1140_hakase_09a:
With the four of you working together, you
should be able to best them.[npcn:B]
common_1140_hakase_09b:
With the four of you working together, you
should be able to best them.[npcn:E]
common_1140_hakase_10a: Prepare yourselves well, then open the gate.[npcn:B]
common_1140_hakase_10b: Prepare yourselves well, then open the gate.[npcn:E]
common_1140_rival_02:
[BD06:0]You’ve got me and [trnm:0]
here!\r
Doesn’t\r
matter\r
what\r
we’re\r
up\r
against.\r
We’ll be fine![npcn:4]
common_1140_friend_02: Hah! Well then, that puts all my worries to rest.[npcn:6]
